## IMetricsManager.getScrollMetrics() method

Returns the metrics for the scroll area of the workspace.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getScrollMetrics(opt_getWorkspaceCoordinates?: boolean, opt_viewMetrics?: ContainerRegion, opt_contentMetrics?: ContainerRegion): ContainerRegion;
```

</td><td>

boolean


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ True to get the scroll metrics in workspace coordinates, false to get them in pixel coordinates.


</td></tr>

opt\_viewMetrics


</td><td>

ContainerRegion


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ The view metrics if they have been previously computed. Passing in null may cause the view metrics to be computed again, if it is needed.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

opt\_contentMetrics


</td><td>

ContainerRegion


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ The content metrics if they have been previously computed. Passing in null may cause the content metrics to be computed again, if it is needed.


</td></tr>
